About

Nicholas Nowosad

Hi I am a NAIT Electronics Engineering Technologist Honors Grad with a 4.0 GPA. In this program I learned varrious electronics principals and various programming languages to varrious degrees. Some of the languages we used included C++, Python, PLC programming and Labview to name a few. Since I graduated I have been learning UE4 with blueprints and C++ along with some HTML, CSS/SCSS and some javascript. Looking for any opportunities in software/technology.
